name: Blasty Tag
description:
You were a hospital patient, but a crazy doctor has drugged you and your fellow hospital mates. He placed you into a scary maze, where you have to survive in the game of Blasty Tag.

In every round, half of the players get a bomb. Your objective is to get rid of yours, before the time runs out. If you cant succeed, you will explode.

  • Movement:  [WASD]  or  [Arrow keys]
  • Players can pass their bomb, by colliding with someone.
